org.lightningj.paywall.keymgmt

Class FileKeyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.keymgmt.FileKeyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultFileKeyManager

    public abstract class FileKeyManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyManager
    Base File Key Manager manages keys stored on disk. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-09-15.

      • getProvider

        public java.lang.String getProvider(Context context)
        Method to return the Security Provider to use in given context. Currently uses SUN provider.
        Specified by:
        getProvider in interface KeyManager
        Parameters:
        context - the related context
        Returns:
        the provider to use.

      • getKeyStorePath

        protected abstract java.lang.String getKeyStorePath()
                                             throws InternalErrorException
        Returns the path of directory where key files are stored.
        Returns:
        the path to the directory where key store files are stored. Or null if not configured.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal error occurred retrieving the key store path.

      • getProtectPassphrase

        protected abstract java.lang.String getProtectPassphrase()
                                                  throws InternalErrorException
        Method to retrieve the configured pass phrase used to protect generated keys.
        Returns:
        the configured protect pass phrase or null if no passphrase is configured.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal error occurred retrieving configuration.

      • getProtectPassphraseWithDefault

        protected char[] getProtectPassphraseWithDefault()
                                          throws InternalErrorException
        Help method that sets a default pass phrase if not configured with a warning log entry.
        Returns:
        passphrase of default pass phrase, never null
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal error occurred retrieving configuration.

      • getDirectory

        protected java.lang.String getDirectory(java.lang.String type,
                                        java.lang.String tempSubDir)
                                 throws InternalErrorException
        Method that returns configured directory for storing using keys. If not configured is temporary directory used, (when used in development test environments).
        Parameters:
        type - display name of path used for logging purposes.
        tempSubDir - the sub directory used if config path is null and temporary directory should be used.
        Returns:
        the name of the directory used to store/fetch keys.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal problems occured.

      • getDirectory

        protected static java.lang.String getDirectory(java.lang.String configPath,
                                               java.lang.String type,
                                               java.lang.String tempSubDir)
                                        throws InternalErrorException
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException
